CommandDefinition.Name: disablecustomorderentry
CommandDefinition.Description: Disable a custom order entry type.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application.

Argument.Name: orderEntryName
Argument.Description: The name of the custom order entry type.

Argument.Name: definingApplicationName
Argument.Description: The name of application defining the order entry type.

Argument.Name: definingApplicationVersion
Argument.Description: The version of the application defining the order entry type.
